chapters.title: Prologue: The First Sparks Fall
chapters.info: Mistress of Novices, p. 25 (21)—Aes Sedai in charge of novice training in the White Tower. She serves as both a disciplinarian and a shoulder to cry on for girls who need either. The current Mistress of Novices is Silviana Brehon of the Red Ajah in the White Tower. See also Bayanar, Sheriam; Brehon, Silviana.
